column1: '''Merry's Simple Courage''' is the thirty-ninth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King'' (extended edition)]]. It was not featured in the theatrical release of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]''.
